comprehensive_overview: Prodigal is a microbial gene finding program that identifies protein-coding regions in microbial genomes. It uses a combination of intrinsic and extrinsic signals to accurately predict genes in bacterial and archaeal genomes.
core_features: Utilizes a combination of intrinsic and extrinsic signals for accuracy
Supports prediction of both start and stop codons
Handles overlapping genes and fragmented assemblies
